capsules.label: Arctic Aurora Guardians
capsules.heritage_context: Braids Sami reindeer herder traditions with mythic aurora spirits and protective outerwear repurposed as couture armor.
signature_garments: floor-length gákti-inspired coat with luminescent quilting
environment_staging: ice cavern runway with dancing aurora projections
futurist snowfield illuminated by drone lights
glass-domed observatory with aurora flare reflections
fusion_strategies: translate gákti panels into sculpted thermochromic layers
reinterpret rune bands as biometric cuff interfaces
elevate fur trims with cruelty-free biotech pelts
follow_up: Introduce vapor trail lighting for motion
Highlight layered braids with micro crystal dust

capsules.label: Andean Sunweaver
capsules.heritage_context: Reimagines Andean weaving cosmology, solar worship, and poncho silhouettes as high-altitude avant-garde fashion.
signature_garments: architectural poncho gown with stepped hem
pleated aguayo skirt with solar burst inserts
modern_fashion_infusions: laser-cut pleating to mimic terraced fields
environment_staging: sun-splashed mountaintop runway with mirrored solar panels
fog-draped terrace lined with terraced light sculptures
fusion_strategies: translate aguayo patterns into iridescent organza overlays
reinterpret quipu knots as illuminated belt fastenings
elevate poncho drape with structured neoprene underlayers
follow_up: Add kinetic tassels responsive to movement
